All Star Mr & Mrs
Episode | Couple 1 | Couple 2 | Couple 3 | Original air date
--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
1 | Jimi Mistry with wife Flavia Cacace | Martina Navratilova with wife Julia Lemigova | Sean Fletcher with wife Luned | 30 September 2015
2 | Catherine Tyldesley with fiancé Tom | Matt Dawson with wife Carolin | Tinchy Stryder with partner Helen | 7 October 2015
3 | Kelvin Fletcher with fiancée Elizabeth | Gemma Merna with husband Ian | Mr Motivator with wife Palmer | 14 October 2015
4 | Quentin Willson with wife Michaela | Jermaine Jenas with wife Ellie | Billie Faiers with fiancé Greg | 21 October 2015
5 | Rochelle Humes with husband Marvin Humes | Vicki Michelle with husband Graham | Tom Parker with partner Kelsey | 28 October 2015
6 | Chris Chittell with fiancée Lesley Dunlop | Tessa Sanderson with husband Densign | Rylan Clark with fiancé Dan Neal | 4 November 2015
7 | Mikey North with fiancée Rachael | Cheryl Baker with husband Steve | Martin Offiah with fiancée Virginia | 18 November 2015
8 | Carl Fogarty with wife Michaela | Vernie Bennett with husband Bryan | Alex Brooker with wife Lynsey | 25 November 2015

wiki_section_title: Episode guide -- Series 7 ( 2015 )

wiki_section_text: The seventh series was recorded from 27 June to 1 July 2015 and premiered on 30 September 2015 . [ 33 ]

intro: All Star Mr & Mrs is a British television show which first began airing on 12 April 2008 on ITV. It is a celebrity revival of the original Mr and Mrs that aired on ITV from 1968 to 1988 with two separate revivals in 1995-1996 and 1999 and was also based on the Canadian game show of the same name. The programme is hosted by Phillip Schofield, although Fern Britton had co-hosted the show with Schofield between 2008-10. The show features celebrities and their real-life partners playing to win up to £30,000 for their chosen charity. On 13 August 2017, it was reported that the series was to be rested for a year, with ITV taking the series off their TV schedule for 2017. It was also rumored that the show could be axed all together. ITV has yet to comment on the show's status, but with the show being taken off TV show audience websites, there will not be a series in 2017.

nq_2061_21.Query Analysis: 查询询问在《All Star Mr and Mrs》第4集中出现的一位职业足球运动员在2005年转会至托特纳姆时的转会费是多少
nq_2061_21.Document Content Analysis: 文档显示了一些球员的转会信息,包括Kyle Walker从托特纳姆转会,John Stones从埃弗顿转会,以及Raheem Sterling从利物浦转会的记录,转会费分别为4800万英镑、4750万英镑和4400万英镑,时间都在2016-2017年间
nq_2061_21.Document and Query Keywords Matching: 文档中仅匹配到'托特纳姆'这一关键词
nq_2061_21.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: 文档中没有出现700万英镑的转会费
nq_2061_21.Key Information Matching: 虽然文档提到了托特纳姆俱乐部的转会,但时间(2016-2017年)与查询所需的2005年不符,且转会费金额也完全不同
nq_2061_21.Can the Document Answer the Query: 否,文档无法直接回答查询
nq_2061_21.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: 否,文档中的信息与查询所需信息在时间和金额上都有很大差异
nq_2061_21.Explanation: 虽然文档中提到了托特纳姆俱乐部,但文档内容主要关于2016-2017年间的高额转会,与2005年700万英镑的转会完全无关。文档既不能直接回答问题,也不能提供有助于推断答案的相关信息,因此判定为不相关。
